author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Update the cfi's for HFNose in testing some beyond Phase2 scenarios

#### PR validation:

Use the cfg's in Geometry/ForwardCommonData/test to test all the cfis

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-gex178 Update the cfi's for HFNose in testing some beyond Phase2 scenarios
